about_the_game:
Steel Runner is a VR vehicle crafting sandbox game using physics.
Create your own unique Runner(vehicle) by combining various types of blocks, then ride it to enjoy free exploration, adventure, and combat in an open-world environment.

Game Play

In this vast open-world, you will spawn with a small runner that you are initially given.
Use your runner to chop down trees, gather ores, and fight enemies to collect blocks, modifying and upgrading it to aim for the ultimate runner!

At times, you may want to switch to a different runner, or your runner might get destroyed by enemies.
But don’t worry, as long as you have the materials, you can always summon your runner from the saved blueprint.

Create various amazing runners and make this vast open-world your own!

Design and Construction

Runners can be created by combining 1 x 1 m blocks.
Create a vehicle body, attach tyres and... you're ready to move!
There are also numerous modules such as weapons, shields and batteries, so get creative with the placement to create your one and only runner!

Each combined block has its own HP, and blocks that can no longer be connected to the centre of the runner will drop out!
Keep your weak points hidden.

Explore the World

Explore a vast open-world built with multiple biomes, various terrains with differing elevations, and numerous points of interest (POIs)!
Depending on the design of your runner, you may find some terrains easier to drive than others.

Combat!

Players piloting their runners can use the controller to aim the weapons attached to their runner.
Utilize a variety of weapons such as cannons, lasers, missiles, and anti-aircraft guns to defeat your enemies!

Enhancing your runner's defense with armor and shields, or modifying the runner structure to create a more resistable design, is also crucial.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR - requires motion controller
  • Additional Notes: requires VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
